trans:
Ing Ing is hereeee!!! ~ (* Â¨Ì®*)/â™¡ï¸
â¿ It's been a while :( Anyway! Only 3 days left... the day is almost here :( I havenâ€™t been able to sleep because of Mr. soldier.. and thinking about it, it's been a year and a half... time has passed so slowly.. â³ Last night, when I was remembering my last goodbye to him before he enlisted, his face was so blurry... it's almost forgotten, almost hard to remember :( Last night, we were video calling and watching together, and finally, the end of this year and a half is in sight :( I want to cry all of a sudden... (Right now, my F is 91% hehehe) But still, congratulations to him first! Finally :(
â¿ A lot has happened in this year and a half...ğŸ Thereâ€™s been so much going on :( that I didnâ€™t even know where to start, and I havenâ€™t written letters in so long ğŸ¤²ğŸ» Iâ€™m so clumsy with it now;; it feels like I need to go back to my school days and start studying again heheheâœğŸ» I couldnâ€™t send a letter to him in a while (?), so Iâ€™m not sure if he remembers me... but Iâ€™ll always have a place for him! ğŸ¤²ğŸ»ğŸ¤ Iâ€™ll go to his concert later~! ! However, because of the responsibilities of becoming an adult in reality ğŸ˜”, I can't just go find him freely anymore :( I can't attend the Hide Out Thailand event or other festivals like in the past, such as in Busan :( Itâ€™s a pity, but letâ€™s see each other at the Thailand concert~! !
â¿ In 2024, I traveled a lot and saw many different landscapes ~ğŸªğŸ–¼ï¸
